reviewText: This documentary on Vivaldi's life and music is based on extended interviews with several very different Vivaldi devotees. It is quirky, informative, and lots of fun. I watched it - then watched it again, twice -- it's that good. If you have an interest in Vivaldi, or in classical music in general, you must have this DVD.  It's apparently scarce, but well worth digging for.
Package arrived with DVD loose and rattling around in the package.  DVD has occasional short skips but otherwise is ok.
